2 days 160 GB only uploader seed

For those who are interested, this is very much on the lines of Thailand's take on a "Friends" style series - not a drama in the mould of "Eastenders" or "Dallas".

Not really for us but will be enjoyed by younger audiences.

Thanks anyway for taking the time and trouble to load it, we are always grateful for any Lakorn while stuck here in the UK.
